node.text: I absolutely abhor this type of behaviour towards anyone, but in my opinion it also doesn't warrant that their livelihood be snatched. Nevertheless you did the right thing by contacting the authorities.
@wilsha_gram, so what do you think is an appropriate punishment for sexual harassment?

Women of the world, beware, this is what you get from @DandgeAjinkya for telling him you're not interested in talking to him anymore. If you're "above 6" he says he'll "make you suck his dick asshole" (sic) and he "keeps people like you".
This is not a #metoo moment, because we should restrict it to workplace harassment. But this guy was deployed by the UN in a war zone in El Salvador when we started talking. It is highly alarming to imagine someone who goes from zero to rapey thoughts in a nanosecond in a war zone. And this is for merely asking why he'd initiated contact with me inspite of me making it clear that I wasn't interested in talking to him. I shudder at what he'd do to someone who's actually rude to him.
Come with me we will launch a complaint to the cyber cell
Who the fuck is he and how dare he talk you like that! Bastard! I’m glad you posted this!
Oh my lord!!!! Please report him.
And awesome, Vinaya for calling him out. Assholes like him need this and more.
Respect for your act. Trust this at least stops one more “Ajinkya” from doing so
WTF! This is so fucking ridiculous! I am so glad that you put this out.
Do report this to the authorities man.
Such a creep! He has deleted his insta profile looks like.
This is outright sexual harassment vimss. I am with you on this such guys need to be shamed. I am glad you posted this.
Yags
WTF! This is just ridiculous- kudos to you @vinayakurtkoti for calling him out!!
Name and Shame
Sorry this happened. You did the right thing by naming and shaming him.
Pls report it to National Commission of Women
More power to you. .
Omg. So sick. I am absolutely livid just reading all this. Vinaya, I can only wonder what it must be like to go through this. So sorry. @vinayakurtkoti

@veganpatticakes I'm so sorry you had to go through that! I don't understand how they can continue to behave this way despite all the awareness that #metoo created. It's their sheer audacity to say whatever they feel that I find disturbing.

I have unfriended and blocked a lot of my former Indian friends because of being ciber stalked and sexually harassed. They would not take no for an answer.  I just don't get their lack of respect for women. Being a woman in India must be hell.
His mother and sister will be proud of him today.. This shows his upbringing ...
Great Bold move.. always keep reporting pervs 👌👍
Proud of you Vins .. glad you posted this .
vinayakurtkoti tell him if you were six you would have kicked his balls from 3 feet away...
@wilsha_gram, it's because you seem to know a lot about how women should deal with sexual harassment, and you seem more concerned about the life of the harasser than the harassed.

@wilsha_gram your first response was "protect the man from the consequences of his own actions" and "he just lost his temper". I don't blame you for this, because it's not unheard of that men say things like Ajinkya Dandage said in anger to women. We have normalised this so much that we don't recognise this as harassment anymore.
@vinayakurtkoti i said he lost his temper "really soon", not he "just" lost his temper. The way you perceive what i said makes a huge difference how you see things.
He lost his temper really soon! But i dont think you should post someone's numbers, it has a very complicated and lasting repercussions. And i do hope you filed a police complaint.
Glad you named him publicly. Hope this has irreversible consequences on him for the trauma he has caused. Power to you.
@wilsha_gram, so what do you think is an appropriate punishment for sexual harassment?

I absolutely abhor this type of behaviour towards anyone, but in my opinion it also doesn't warrant that their livelihood be snatched. Nevertheless you did the right thing by contacting the authorities.

node.accessibility_caption: Image may contain: one or more people
